typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EquipmentComponent as string,
		AgingFamily as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadCreateEquipmentComponentsAgingFamilies
ReadCreateEquipmentComponentsAgingFamilies select(mapColumn(
		{$sourceId} = EquipmentComponent,
		{$targetId} = AgingFamily),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> IdSelection
IdSelection derive({$relationshipName} = 'AgingLaw',
	{$relationshipDelete} = 'false',
	{$relationshipId} = {$sourceId} + 'to' + {$targetId}) ~> ModelDefinition
ModelDefinition sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['tmp_EquipmentComponentsAgingFamilies.v1.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteToTempRepo
source(output(
		EquipmentComponent as string,
		AgingFamily as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadTempStatusEquipmentComponentsAgingFamiliesStatusEditor
ReadCreateEquipmentComponentsAgingFamilies select(mapColumn(
		EquipmentComponent,
		AgingFamily),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StatusColumnSelectionEquipmentComponentsAgingFamiliesStatusEditor
ReadTempStatusEquipmentComponentsAgingFamiliesStatusEditor, StatusColumnSelectionEquipmentComponentsAgingFamiliesStatusEditor union(byName: true)~> StatusUpdateEquipmentComponentsAgingFamiliesStatusEditor
StatusUpdateEquipmentComponentsAgingFamiliesStatusEditor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['EquipmentComponents_AgingFamilies_status.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteTempStatusStatusUpdateEquipmentComponentsAgingFamiliesStatusEditor
